# Create Java MSM object

```{r}
library(deisotoper)
load(system.file("extdata",
   name='TP_HeLa_200ng_filtered_pd21.RData', package = "deisotoper"))
joMSM <- jCreateMSM(TP_HeLa_200ng_filtered_pd21)
```


# MSM Summary

```{r fig.retina=3, fig.height=6, fig.width=7}
library(lattice)

bwplot(Value ~ Attribute, 
       data=jSummaryMSM(joMSM),
       scales = list(y = list(log = TRUE), x = list(rot = 45)))
```
